## Using the Pull Request Templates

* There are three templates available `bug.md`, `enhancement.md`, and `feature.md`
* Here is the URL template to use when creating a new pull request:

```
https://github.com/cmu-mfi/mfi_ddb_library/compare/main...<new-branch-name>?quick_pull=1&template=<template.md>
```
* Copy-paste the URL into your browser to create a new pull request with the selected template.


### Examples

```
https://github.com/cmu-mfi/mfi_ddb_library/compare/main...feature/executable_modules?quick_pull=1&template=feature.md
```
```
https://github.com/cmu-mfi/mfi_ddb_library/compare/main...bugfix/36/ros_callback?quick_pull=1&template=bug.md
```
